subsection_content:
Intestinal inflammation causes many painful and uncomfortable symptoms, and can even lead to numerous serious complications if not treated effectively. Currently, there is no method to prevent inflammatory bowel disease. Below are some useful solutions that can help control symptoms that patients should implement: (2)
Eat small meals 2 – 4 hours apart; Control stress by meditating, practicing tai chi, yoga, listening to music...; Maintain adequate sleep and regular physical activity.; Avoid consuming foods that can irritate the intestines, typically milk, spicy foods, greasy foods, etc.; Limit consumption of drinks containing alcohol, caffeine, gas...; Always drink plenty of water every day.; Give up the habit of smoking.
Dividing meals into smaller portions throughout the day is also an effective way to prevent intestinal inflammation
